name: You win some, you lose some
name_original: You win some, you lose some
description:
This is a small game for the Wowie Jam 3.0

This was my second game jam I've been in, the game is not the best but I'm still quite proud of it.

It's just a normal platformer but the winning and losing conditions are changing from level to level.

I would  have loved to add some nice sound effects, a nicer background and tons more but due to time presure I couldn't. My mental helth was draining a bit so i decided to just submit this slightly broken game.
